statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT id, patent_number, expiry_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE royalty > 1000;
SELECT patent_number, expiry_date, licensing_agreement_id FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE licensing_agreement_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, licensing_agreement_id, royalty FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY royalty DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE royalty > 1000 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT id, patent_number, licensing_agreement_id FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE licensing_agreement_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, patent_number, expiry_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiry_date;
SELECT id, patent_number, royalty FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE royalty BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT id, patent_number, licensing_agreement_id, royalty FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE licensing_agreement_id = 123 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE royalties > 1000;
SELECT patent_name, expiry_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiry_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM pharmaceutical_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT licensing_agreement_terms FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_name, royalties FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE patent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE royalties > 1000 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT patent_name, royalties FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE royalties < 5000 AND expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT company_name, established_date FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE established_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2010-12-31' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE headquarters_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT patent_name, licensing_agreement_terms FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE licensing_agreement_terms IS NOT NULL AND royalties <= 500 ORDER BY royalties DESC, patent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_name, patent_owner FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_name, royalty_rate FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY royalty_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM licensing_agreements WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT licensee, payment_amount FROM licensing_agreements JOIN royalty_payments ON licensing_agreements.agreement_id = royalty_payments.agreement_id;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, patent_owner FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY patent_owner DESC;
SELECT * FROM licensing_agreements WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT licensee, payment_amount FROM licensing_agreements JOIN royalty_payments ON licensing_agreements.agreement_id = royalty_payments.agreement_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000;

SELECT patent_name, licensing_terms, payment_amount FROM pharmaceutical_patents JOIN licensing_agreements ON pharmaceutical_patents.patent_id = licensing_agreements.patent_id JOIN royalty_payments ON licensing_agreements.agreement_id = royalty_payments.agreement_id;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_number, patent_description FROM patents WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT licensee_name, licensor_name, agreement_date FROM license_agreements ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, royalty_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM royalty_terms WHERE royalty_percentage > 10;
SELECT * FROM agreements_history WHERE modification_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT patent_number, patent_description FROM patents WHERE id = 3;
SELECT licensee_name, licensor_name FROM license_agreements WHERE agreement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM royalty_terms WHERE royalty_percentage > 10 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, modification_date, description FROM agreements_history ORDER BY modification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM licensing_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, company_name, term_start_date, royalty_percentage FROM licensing_agreements;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT licensee_name, license_start_date, license_end_date FROM licensees ORDER BY license_start_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM licensing_agreements;
SELECT company_name, term_start_date, term_end_date FROM licensing_agreements ORDER BY term_start_date DESC;
SELECT licensee_name, license_start_date, license_end_date FROM licensees WHERE license_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_name, patent_owner, expiry_date FROM patents WHERE expiry_date > CURDATE();
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
